headline: Super Bowl 60 recap: Rewatch the ads after Seahawks clinch the championship
summary: The Seattle Seahawks defeated the New England Patriots in Super Bowl 60. CNBC covered all the top ads and business news from football's biggest night.

raw.headline: Super Bowl 60 recap: Rewatch the ads after Seahawks clinch the championship

headline: EXCLUSIVE: Should The Day After Super Bowl Be A Holiday? 55% Say This
summary: Calls to make the day after the Super Bowl a national holiday have grown in recent years. The good news is in 2027, the day after is a holiday.

raw.headline: EXCLUSIVE: Should The Day After Super Bowl Be A Holiday? 55% Say This
raw.summary: Calls to make the day after the Super Bowl a national holiday have grown in recent years. The good news is in 2027, the day after is a holiday.

headline: Comcast Reshapes Media Portfolio As Investors Weigh Versant And Valuation
summary: Comcast (NasdaqGS:CMCSA) has spun off a group of cable networks and reorganized its media assets under a new unit called Versant Media Group. The company is sharpening its focus on broadband, streaming through Peacock, and its theme park operations. Bank of America has upgraded Comcast, pointing to potential value from ongoing merger activity and asset reshuffling. The changes raise questions about future options for NBCUniversal, including possible partnerships or transactions. For you as...
